bacci.giovanni.deunifier.DeUniFier.pipelines.unifier

Class FileCounter

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • bacci.giovanni.deunifier.DeUniFier.pipelines.unifier.FileCounter
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FileStreamCounter, SequenceFileCounter, TagFileCounterMod

    public abstract class FileCounter
extends Observable
    Standard implementation of a pipeline able to find all identitcal sequences in a file and write:
    1 - a frequency table
    2 - a file containing all unique sequences
    3 - (optional) a file containing all ids
    Author:
    Giovanni Bacci

      • writeTable

        protected boolean writeTable(Map.Entry<Sequence,TaggedFrequency> entry,
                 FrequencyWriter writer,
                 boolean header)
        Utility method to write an entry in the frequency table in a synchronized way. This method return a Boolean always set to false in order to write the frequency table's header only one time. For example

        boolean header = true; for(Sequence s : listSequences){ header = hypotheticalFileCounter.writeTable(entry, writer, header) }

        In this way the header will be written only one time.
        Parameters:
        entry - an Map.Entry with a Sequence as RenderingHints.Key and a FrequencyWriter as value.
        writer - a FrequencyWriter
        header - a Boolean
        Returns:
        false

      • setDoing

        protected void setDoing(String doing)
        Observable method.
        Parameters:
        doing - a String taht will be passed to all the Observer
        See Also:
        Observable

      • incrementProgress

        protected abstract void incrementProgress()
        Abstract method. This method should be used to tip off all observers that this FileCounter advanced.

      • writeOutput

        public abstract void writeOutput(SequenceWriter sequenceWriter,
               FrequencyWriter frequencyWriter,
               Writer writer)
                          throws IOException
        Abstract method that has to write a sequence, its frequency and the ids
        Parameters:
        sequenceWriter - a SequenceWriter
        frequencyWriter - a FrequencyWriter
        writer - a Writer
        Throws:
        IOException - if an IOException occurs while writing.
